exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros H. unfold locally in H. unfold Derive_n. simpl. induction n as [|n' IHn']. - intros k Hk. specialize (H 1%nat). simpl in H. rewrite Rmult_1_r in H. apply H, Hk. - intros k Hk. specialize (H (S (S (S n')))). simpl in H. rewrite Rmult_1_r in H. apply H, Hk.
